00051   */
00052 /**
00053  * @brief Enumeration of TM counter mode.
00054  */
00055 typedef enum
00056 {
00057   TM_CNT_MODE_UP   = 0x00000000,  /*!< Edge up-counting mode                                                */
00058   TM_CNT_MODE_CA1  = 0x00010000,  /*!< Center-align mode 1                                                  */
00059   TM_CNT_MODE_CA2  = 0x00020000,  /*!< Center-align mode 2                                                  */
00060   TM_CNT_MODE_CA3  = 0x00030000,  /*!< Center-align mode 3                                                  */
00061   TM_CNT_MODE_DOWN = 0x01000000   /*!< Edge down-counting mode                                              */
00062 } TM_CNT_MODE_Enum;
00063 /**
00064  * @brief Enumeration of  TM prescaler reload time.
00065  */
00066 typedef enum
00067 {
00068   TM_PSC_RLD_UPDATE    = 0x0000,  /*!< Reload prescaler at next update event                                */
00069   TM_PSC_RLD_IMMEDIATE = 0x0100   /*!< Reload prescaler immediately                                         */
00070 } TM_PSC_RLD_Enum;
00071 /**
00072  * @brief Enumeration of TM channel output mode.
00073  */
00074 typedef enum
00075 {
00076   TM_OM_MATCH_NOCHANGE  = 0x0000, /*!< TM channel output no change on match                                 */
00077   TM_OM_MATCH_INACTIVE  = 0x0001, /*!< TM channel output inactive level on match                            */
00078   TM_OM_MATCH_ACTIVE    = 0x0002, /*!< TM channel output active level on match                              */
00079   TM_OM_MATCH_TOGGLE    = 0x0003, /*!< TM channel output toggle on match                                    */
00080   TM_OM_FORCED_INACTIVE = 0x0004, /*!< TM channel output forced inactive level                              */
00081   TM_OM_FORCED_ACTIVE   = 0x0005, /*!< TM channel output forced active level                                */
00082   TM_OM_PWM1            = 0x0006, /*!< TM channel pwm1 output mode                                          */
00083   TM_OM_PWM2            = 0x0007, /*!< TM channel pwm2 output mode                                          */
00084   TM_OM_ASYMMETRIC_PWM1 = 0x0106, /*!< TM channel asymmetric pwm1 output mode                               */
00085   TM_OM_ASYMMETRIC_PWM2 = 0x0107  /*!< TM channel asymmetric pwm2 output mode                               */
00086 } TM_OM_Enum;
00087 /**
00088  * @brief Enumeration of TM channel capture source selection.
00089  */
00090 typedef enum
00091 {
00092   TM_CHCCS_DIRECT   = 0x00010000,  /*!< TM channel capture selection direct input                           */
00093   TM_CHCCS_INDIRECT = 0x00020000,  /*!< TM channel capture selection indirect input                         */
00094   TM_CHCCS_TRCED    = 0x00030000   /*!< TM channel capture selection TRCED of trigger control block         */
00095 } TM_CHCCS_Enum;
00096 /**
00097  * @brief Enumeration of TM channel capture prescaler.
00098  */
00099 typedef enum
00100 {
00101   TM_CHPSC_OFF = 0x00000000,     /*!< TM channel capture no prescaler, capture is done each event           */
00102   TM_CHPSC_2   = 0x00040000,     /*!< TM channel capture is done once every 2 event                         */
00103   TM_CHPSC_4   = 0x00080000,     /*!< TM channel capture is done once every 4 event                         */
00104   TM_CHPSC_8   = 0x000C0000      /*!< TM channel capture is done once every 8 event                         */
00105 } TM_CHPSC_Enum;
00106 #if (LIBCFG_TM_652XX_V1)

00111 {

00113   TM_CHFDIV_2   = 0x00000001,     /*!< TM channel Filter Fsampling = Fdts/2                                 */
00114   TM_CHFDIV_4   = 0x00000002,     /*!< TM channel Filter Fsampling = Fdts/4                                 */
00115   TM_CHFDIV_8   = 0x00000003,     /*!< TM channel Filter Fsampling = Fdts/8                                 */
00116   TM_CHFDIV_16  = 0x00000004,     /*!< TM channel Filter Fsampling = Fdts/16                                */
00117   TM_CHFDIV_32  = 0x00000005,     /*!< TM channel Filter Fsampling = Fdts/32                                */
00118   TM_CHFDIV_64  = 0x00000006      /*!< TM channel Filter Fsampling = Fdts/64                                */
00119 } TM_CHFDIV_Enum;

00171 /**
00172  * @brief Enumeration of TM fDTS clock divider.
00173  */
00174 typedef enum
00175 {
00176   TM_CKDIV_OFF = 0x0000,          /*!< fDTS = fCLKIN                                                        */
00177   TM_CKDIV_2   = 0x0100,          /*!< fDTS = fCLKIN / 2                                                    */
00178   TM_CKDIV_4   = 0x0200,          /*!< fDTS = fCLKIN / 4                                                    */
00179   #if (LIBCFG_TM_652XX_V1 || LIBCFG_TM_CKDIV_8)
00180   TM_CKDIV_8   = 0x0300,          /*!< fDTS = fCLKIN / 8                                                    */
00181   #endif
00182 } TM_CKDIV_Enum;
00183 #if 0
00184 /**
00185  * @brief Enumeration of TM ETI input prescaler.
00186  */
00187 typedef enum
00188 {
00189   TM_ETIPSC_OFF = 0x00000000,     /*!< ETI prescaler off                                                    */
00190   TM_ETIPSC_2   = 0x00001000,     /*!< ETIP frequency divided by 2                                          */
00191   TM_ETIPSC_4   = 0x00002000,     /*!< ETIP frequency divided by 4                                          */
00192   TM_ETIPSC_8   = 0x00003000      /*!< ETIP frequency divided by 8                                          */
00193 } TM_ETIPSC_Enum;
00194 /**
00195  * @brief Enumeration of TM ETI input polarity.
00196  */
00197 typedef enum
00198 {
00199   TM_ETIPOL_NONINVERTED = 0x00000000, /*!< TM ETI polarity is active high or rising edge                    */
00200   TM_ETIPOL_INVERTED    = 0x00010000  /*!< TM ETI polarity is active low or falling edge                    */
00201 } TM_ETIPOL_Enum;
00202 #endif
00203 /**
00204  * @brief Enumeration of TM slave trigger input selection.
00205  */
00206 typedef enum
00207 {
00208   TM_TRSEL_UEVG   = 0x0,         /*!< Software trigger by setting UEVG bit                                  */
00209   TM_TRSEL_TI0S0  = 0x1,         /*!< Filtered channel 0 input                                              */
00210   TM_TRSEL_TI1S1  = 0x2,         /*!< Filtered channel 1 input                                              */
00211   TM_TRSEL_ETIF   = 0x3,         /*!< External Trigger input                                                */
00212   TM_TRSEL_TI0BED = 0x8,         /*!< Trigger input 0 both edge detector                                    */
00213 #if (LIBCFG_TM_NO_ITI == 1)
00214   #define IS_TRSEL_ITI0(x)   (0)
00215   #define IS_TRSEL_ITI1(x)   (0)
00216   #define IS_TRSEL_ITI2(x)   (0)
00217 #else
00218   TM_TRSEL_ITI0   = 0x9,         /*!< Internal trigger input 0                                              */
00219   TM_TRSEL_ITI1   = 0xA,         /*!< Internal trigger input 1                                              */
00220   TM_TRSEL_ITI2   = 0xB          /*!< Internal trigger input 2                                              */
00221   #define IS_TRSEL_ITI0(x)   (x == TM_TRSEL_ITI0)
00222   #define IS_TRSEL_ITI1(x)   (x == TM_TRSEL_ITI1)
00223   #define IS_TRSEL_ITI2(x)   (x == TM_TRSEL_ITI2)
00224 #endif
00225 } TM_TRSEL_Enum;
00226 /**
00227  * @brief Enumeration of TM slave mode selection.
00228  */
00229 typedef enum
00230 {
00231   TM_SMSEL_DISABLE  = 0x0000,     /*!< The prescaler is clocked directly by the internal clock              */
00232   TM_SMSEL_DECODER1 = 0x0100,     /*!< Counter counts up/down on CH0 edge depending on CH1 level            */
00233   TM_SMSEL_DECODER2 = 0x0200,     /*!< Counter counts up/down on CH1 edge depending on CH0 level            */
00234   TM_SMSEL_DECODER3 = 0x0300,     /*!< Counter counts up/down on both CH0 & CH1 edges depending on the
00235                                        level of the other input */
00236   TM_SMSEL_RESTART  = 0x0400,     /*!< Slave restart mode                                                   */
00237   TM_SMSEL_PAUSE    = 0x0500,     /*!< Slave pause mode                                                     */
00238   TM_SMSEL_TRIGGER  = 0x0600,     /*!< Slave trigger mode                                                   */
00239   TM_SMSEL_STIED    = 0x0700,     /*!< Rising edge of the selected trigger(STI) clock the counter           */
00240   #if (LIBCFG_TM_652XX_V1)
00241   TM_SMSEL_DECODER4 = 0x0800,     /*!< Pluse/Direction mode(Counter counts on Ch0, Count up/down on Ch1     */
00242   #endif
00243 } TM_SMSEL_Enum;
00244 /**
00245  * @brief  Enumeration of TM master mode selection.
00246  */
00247 typedef enum
00248 {
00249   TM_MMSEL_RESET   = 0x00000000,  /*!< Send trigger signal when S/W setting UEVG or slave restart           */
00250   TM_MMSEL_ENABLE  = 0x00010000,  /*!< The counter enable signal is used as trigger output.                 */
00251   TM_MMSEL_UPDATE  = 0x00020000,  /*!< The update event is used as trigger output.                          */
00252   TM_MMSEL_CH0CC   = 0x00030000,  /*!< Channel 0 capture or compare match occurred as trigger output.       */
00253   TM_MMSEL_CH0OREF = 0x00040000,  /*!< The CH0OREF signal is used as trigger output.                        */
00254   TM_MMSEL_CH1OREF = 0x00050000,  /*!< The CH1OREF signal is used as trigger output.                        */
00255   TM_MMSEL_CH2OREF = 0x00060000,  /*!< The CH2OREF signal is used as trigger output.                        */
00256   TM_MMSEL_CH3OREF = 0x00070000,  /*!< The CH3OREF signal is used as trigger output.                        */
00257   #if (LIBCFG_TM_652XX_V1)
00258   TM_MMSEL_VCLK    = 0x000C0000   /*!< The VCLK signal is used as trigger output.                           */
00259   #endif
00260   #if (LIBCFG_PWM_8_CHANNEL)
00261   TM_MMSEL_CH4OREF = 0x00080000,   /*!< The CH4OREF signal is used as trigger output.                       */
00262   TM_MMSEL_CH5OREF = 0x00090000,   /*!< The CH5OREF signal is used as trigger output.                       */
00263   TM_MMSEL_CH6OREF = 0x000A0000,   /*!< The CH6OREF signal is used as trigger output.                       */
00264   TM_MMSEL_CH7OREF = 0x000B0000    /*!< The CH7OREF signal is used as trigger output.                       */
00265   #endif
00266 } TM_MMSEL_Enum;
00267 #if (LIBCFG_PDMA)
00268 /**
00269  * @brief Enumeration of TM channel Capture / Compare PDMA selection.
00270  */
00271 typedef enum
00272 {
00273   TM_CHCCDS_CHCCEV = 0,       /*!< Send CHx PDMA request when channel capture/compare event occurs          */
00274   TM_CHCCDS_UEV               /*!< Send CHx PDMA request when update event occurs                           */
00275 } TM_CHCCDS_Enum;
00276 #endif
00277 /**
00278  * @brief Definition of TM timebase init structure.
00279  */
00280 typedef struct
00281 {
00282   u16              CounterReload;         /*!< Period (Value for CRR register)                              */
00283 #if(LIBCFG_TM_PRESCALER_8BIT)
00284   u8               Prescaler;             /*!< Prescaler (Value for PSCR register)                          */
00285 #else
00286   u16              Prescaler;             /*!< Prescaler (Value for PSCR register)                          */
00287 #endif
00288   u8               RepetitionCounter;     /*!< Repetition counter                                           */
00289   TM_CNT_MODE_Enum CounterMode;           /*!< Counter mode refer to \ref TM_CNT_MODE_Enum                  */
00290   TM_PSC_RLD_Enum  PSCReloadTime;         /*!< Prescaler reload mode refer to \ref TM_PSC_RLD_Enum          */
00291 } TM_TimeBaseInitTypeDef;
00292 /**
00293  * @brief Definition of TM channel output init structure.
00294  */
00295 typedef struct
00296 {
00297   TM_CH_Enum      Channel;              /*!< Channel selection refer to \ref TM_CH_Enum                     */
00298   TM_OM_Enum      OutputMode;           /*!< Channel output mode selection refer to \ref TM_OM_Enum         */
00299   TM_CHCTL_Enum   Control;              /*!< CHxO output state refer to \ref TM_CHCTL_Enum                  */
00300   TM_CHCTL_Enum   ControlN;             /*!< CHxO output state refer to \ref TM_CHCTL_Enum                  */
00301   TM_CHP_Enum     Polarity;             /*!< CHxO polarity refer to \ref TM_CHP_Enum                        */
00302   TM_CHP_Enum     PolarityN;            /*!< CHxO polarity refer to \ref TM_CHP_Enum                        */
00303   MCTM_OIS_Enum   IdleState;            /*!< CHxO polarity refer to \ref TM_CHP_Enum                        */
00304   MCTM_OIS_Enum   IdleStateN;           /*!< CHxO polarity refer to \ref TM_CHP_Enum                        */
00305   u16             Compare;              /*!< Value for CHxCCR register                                      */
00306   u16             AsymmetricCompare;    /*!< Value for CHxACR register                                      */
00307 } TM_OutputInitTypeDef;
00308 /**
00309  * @brief Definition of TM channel input init structure.
00310  */
00311 typedef struct
00312 {
00313   TM_CH_Enum    Channel;         /*!< Channel selection refer to \ref TM_CH_Enum                            */
00314   TM_CHP_Enum   Polarity;        /*!< Channel input polarity refer to \ref TM_CHP_Enum                      */
00315   TM_CHCCS_Enum Selection;       /*!< Channel capture source selection refer to \ref TM_CHCCS_Enum          */
00316   TM_CHPSC_Enum Prescaler;       /*!< Channel Capture prescaler refer to \ref TM_CHPSC_Enum                 */
00317   #if (LIBCFG_TM_652XX_V1)
00318   TM_CHFDIV_Enum  Fsampling;     /*!< Digital filter Fsampling Frequency, it must fDTS/1 ~ fDTS/64          */
00319   #if (LIBCFG_TM_TIFN_5BIT)
00320   u8              Event;         /*!< Digital filter N-event counter Setting, it must be 0 ~ 31             */
00321   #else
00322   TM_CHFEV_Enum   Event;         /*!< Digital filter N-event counter Setting, it must be 0, 2, 4, 8, 12, 16 */
00323   #endif
00324   #else
00325   u8            Filter;          /*!< Digital filter Configuration, it must between 0x0 ~ 0xF.              */
00326   #endif
00327 } TM_CaptureInitTypeDef;

00337 /** @defgroup TM_INT Definitions of TM_INT
00338   * @{
00339   */
00340 #define TM_INT_CH0CC        0x0001  /*!< Channel 0 capture/compare interrupt                                */
00341 #define TM_INT_CH1CC        0x0002  /*!< Channel 1 capture/compare interrupt                                */
00342 #define TM_INT_CH2CC        0x0004  /*!< Channel 2 capture/compare interrupt                                */
00343 #define TM_INT_CH3CC        0x0008  /*!< Channel 3 capture/compare interrupt                                */
00344 #if (LIBCFG_PWM_8_CHANNEL)
00345 #define TM_INT_CH4CC        0x10000000ul      /*!< Channel 4 compare interrupt                              */
00346 #define TM_INT_CH5CC        0x20000000ul      /*!< Channel 5 compare interrupt                              */
00347 #define TM_INT_CH6CC        0x40000000ul      /*!< Channel 6 compare interrupt                              */
00348 #define TM_INT_CH7CC        0x80000000ul      /*!< Channel 7 compare interrupt                              */
00349 #endif
00350 #define TM_INT_UEV          0x0100  /*!< Update interrupt                                                   */
00351 #define TM_INT_UEV2         0x0200  /*!< Update interrupt 2                                                 */
00352 #define TM_INT_TEV          0x0400  /*!< Trigger interrupt                                                  */
00353 #define TM_INT_BRKEV        0x0800  /*!< Break interrupt                                                    */
00354 
00355 #if (LIBCFG_TM_652XX_V1)
00356 #define MCTM_INT_CH0CD      0x100000  /*!< Channel 0 Count-Down compare interrupt                           */
00357 #define MCTM_INT_CH1CD      0x200000  /*!< Channel 1 Count-Down compare interrupt                           */
00358 #define MCTM_INT_CH2CD      0x400000  /*!< Channel 2 Count-Down compare interrupt                           */
00359 #define MCTM_INT_CH3CD      0x800000  /*!< Channel 3 Count-Down compare interrupt                           */
00360 
00361 #define TM_INT_VC           0x1000  /*!< Quadrature Decoder VCLK interrupt                                  */
00362 #define TM_INT_QC           0x2000  /*!< Quadrature Decoder CLKPULSE interrupt                              */
00363 #define TM_INT_PE           0x4000  /*!< Quadrature Decoder Phase Error interrupt                           */
00364 #define TM_INT_DC           0x8000  /*!< Quadrature Decoder Direction Change interrupt                      */
00365 
00366 #define MCTM_INT_OVER       0x2000  /*!< Counter overflow interrupt                                         */
00367 #define MCTM_INT_UNDER      0x4000  /*!< Counter underflow Interrupt                                        */
00368 #if (LIBCFG_TM_65232)
00369 #define MCTM_INT_RECCDIF    0x8000  /*!< CCIF or CDIF Interrupt flag control by REPR                        */
00370 #endif
00371 
00372 #endif

00381 #define TM_PDMA_CH0CC        0x00010000  /*!< Channel 0 capture/compare PDMA request                        */

00383 #define TM_PDMA_CH2CC        0x00040000  /*!< Channel 2 capture/compare PDMA request                        */

00385 #define TM_PDMA_UEV          0x01000000  /*!< Update PDMA request                                           */

00393 /** @defgroup TM_EVENT Definitions of TM_EVENT

00395   */
00396 #define TM_EVENT_CH0CC      0x0001  /*!< Channel 0 capture/compare event                                    */
00397 #define TM_EVENT_CH1CC      0x0002  /*!< Channel 1 capture/compare event                                    */
00398 #define TM_EVENT_CH2CC      0x0004  /*!< Channel 2 capture/compare event                                    */
00399 #define TM_EVENT_CH3CC      0x0008  /*!< Channel 3 capture/compare event                                    */
00400 #if (LIBCFG_PWM_8_CHANNEL)
00401 #define TM_EVENT_CH4CC      0x10000000ul  /*!< Channel 4 compare event                                      */
00402 #define TM_EVENT_CH5CC      0x20000000ul  /*!< Channel 5 compare event                                      */
00403 #define TM_EVENT_CH6CC      0x40000000ul  /*!< Channel 6 compare event                                      */
00404 #define TM_EVENT_CH7CC      0x80000000ul  /*!< Channel 7 compare event                                      */
00405 #endif
00406 #define TM_EVENT_UEV        0x0100  /*!< Update event                                                       */
00407 #define TM_EVENT_UEV2       0x0200  /*!< Update event 2                                                     */
00408 #define TM_EVENT_TEV        0x0400  /*!< Trigger event                                                      */
00409 #define TM_EVENT_BRKEV      0x0800  /*!< Break event                                                        */

00414 /** @defgroup TM_FLAG Definitions of TM_FLAG
00415   * @{
00416   */
00417 #define TM_FLAG_CH0CC       0x0001  /*!< Channel 0 capture/compare flag                                     */
00418 #define TM_FLAG_CH1CC       0x0002  /*!< Channel 1 capture/compare flag                                     */
00419 #define TM_FLAG_CH2CC       0x0004  /*!< Channel 2 capture/compare flag                                     */
00420 #define TM_FLAG_CH3CC       0x0008  /*!< Channel 3 capture/compare flag                                     */
00421 #if (LIBCFG_PWM_8_CHANNEL)
00422 #define TM_FLAG_CH4CC       0x10000000ul  /*!< Channel 4 compare flag                                       */
00423 #define TM_FLAG_CH5CC       0x20000000ul  /*!< Channel 5 compare flag                                       */
00424 #define TM_FLAG_CH6CC       0x40000000ul  /*!< Channel 6 compare flag                                       */
00425 #define TM_FLAG_CH7CC       0x80000000ul  /*!< Channel 7 compare flag                                       */
00426 #endif
00427 #define TM_FLAG_CH0OC       0x0010  /*!< Channel 0 over capture flag                                        */
00428 #define TM_FLAG_CH1OC       0x0020  /*!< Channel 1 over capture flag                                        */
00429 #define TM_FLAG_CH2OC       0x0040  /*!< Channel 2 over capture flag                                        */
00430 #define TM_FLAG_CH3OC       0x0080  /*!< Channel 3 over capture flag                                        */
00431 #define TM_FLAG_UEV         0x0100  /*!< Update flag                                                        */
00432 #define TM_FLAG_UEV2        0x0200  /*!< Update 2 flag                                                      */
00433 #define TM_FLAG_TEV         0x0400  /*!< Trigger flag                                                       */
00434 #define TM_FLAG_BRK0        0x0800  /*!< Break 0 flag                                                       */
00435 #define TM_FLAG_BRK1        0x1000  /*!< Break 1 flag                                                       */
00436 /**
00437   * @}
00438   */
00439 
00440 /** @defgroup TM_Check_Parameter Check parameter
00441   * @{
00442   */
00443 
00444 /**
00445  * @brief Used to check parameter of the TMx.
00446  */
00447 #define IS_TM(x)            (IS_GPTM0(x) || IS_GPTM1(x) || IS_MCTM0(x) || IS_PWM0(x) || IS_PWM1(x) || IS_PWM2(x) || IS_SCTM(x))
00448 #if (!LIBCFG_NO_GPTM0)
00449 #define IS_GPTM0(x)         (x == HT_GPTM0)
00450 #else
00451 #define IS_GPTM0(x)         (0)
00452 #endif
00453 
00454 #if (LIBCFG_GPTM1)
00455 #define IS_GPTM1(x)         (x == HT_GPTM1)
00456 #else
00457 #define IS_GPTM1(x)         (0)
00458 #endif
00459 
00460 #if (LIBCFG_MCTM0)
00461 #define IS_MCTM0(x)         (x == HT_MCTM0)
00462 #else
00463 #define IS_MCTM0(x)         (0)
00464 #endif
00465 
00466 #if (LIBCFG_PWM0)
00467 #define IS_PWM0(x)          (x == HT_PWM0)
00468 #else
00469 #define IS_PWM0(x)          (0)
00470 #endif
00471 
00472 #if (LIBCFG_PWM1)
00473 #define IS_PWM1(x)          (x == HT_PWM1)
00474 #else
00475 #define IS_PWM1(x)          (0)
00476 #endif
00477 
00478 #if (LIBCFG_PWM2)
00479 #define IS_PWM2(x)          (x == HT_PWM2)
00480 #else
00481 #define IS_PWM2(x)          (0)
00482 #endif
00483 
00484 #define IS_SCTM(x)          (IS_SCTM0(x) || IS_SCTM1(x) || IS_SCTM2(x) || IS_SCTM3(x))
00485 
00486 #define IS_SCTM0(x)         (0)
00487 #define IS_SCTM1(x)         (0)
00488 #define IS_SCTM2(x)         (0)
00489 #define IS_SCTM3(x)         (0)
00490 
00491 #if (LIBCFG_SCTM0)
00492 #undef IS_SCTM0
00493 #define IS_SCTM0(x)         (x == HT_SCTM0)
00494 #endif
00495 
00496 #if (LIBCFG_SCTM1)
00497 #undef IS_SCTM1
00498 #define IS_SCTM1(x)         (x == HT_SCTM1)
00499 #endif
00500 
00501 #if (LIBCFG_SCTM2)
00502 #undef IS_SCTM2
00503 #define IS_SCTM2(x)         (x == HT_SCTM2)
00504 #endif
00505 
00506 #if (LIBCFG_SCTM3)
00507 #undef IS_SCTM3
00508 #define IS_SCTM3(x)         (x == HT_SCTM3)
00509 #endif
00510 
00511 /**
00512  * @brief Used to check parameter of the output compare mode.
00513  */
00514 #define IS_TM_OM_CMP(x) (((x) == TM_OM_MATCH_NOCHANGE) || \
00515                            ((x) == TM_OM_MATCH_INACTIVE) || \
00516                            ((x) == TM_OM_MATCH_ACTIVE) || \
00517                            ((x) == TM_OM_MATCH_TOGGLE) || \
00518                            ((x) == TM_OM_PWM1) || \
00519                            ((x) == TM_OM_PWM2))
00520 /**
00521  * @brief Used to check parameter of the output mode.
00522  */
00523 #define IS_TM_OM(x) (((x) == TM_OM_MATCH_NOCHANGE)  || \
00524                      ((x) == TM_OM_MATCH_INACTIVE)  || \
00525                      ((x) == TM_OM_MATCH_ACTIVE)    || \
00526                      ((x) == TM_OM_MATCH_TOGGLE)    || \
00527                      ((x) == TM_OM_PWM1)            || \
00528                      ((x) == TM_OM_PWM2)            || \
00529                      ((x) == TM_OM_FORCED_INACTIVE) || \
00530                      ((x) == TM_OM_FORCED_ACTIVE)   || \
00531                      ((x) == TM_OM_ASYMMETRIC_PWM1) || \
00532                      ((x) == TM_OM_ASYMMETRIC_PWM2))
00533 
00534 #define IS_TM_OM_NOASYM(x) (((x) == TM_OM_MATCH_NOCHANGE)  || \
00535                             ((x) == TM_OM_MATCH_INACTIVE)  || \
00536                             ((x) == TM_OM_MATCH_ACTIVE)    || \
00537                             ((x) == TM_OM_MATCH_TOGGLE)    || \
00538                             ((x) == TM_OM_PWM1)            || \
00539                             ((x) == TM_OM_PWM2)            || \
00540                             ((x) == TM_OM_FORCED_INACTIVE) || \
00541                             ((x) == TM_OM_FORCED_ACTIVE))
00542 /**
00543  * @brief Used to check parameter of the channel.
00544  */
00545 #define IS_TM_CH_0(x)     (x == TM_CH_0)
00546 #define IS_TM_CH_1(x)     (x == TM_CH_1)
00547 #define IS_TM_CH_2(x)     (x == TM_CH_2)
00548 #define IS_TM_CH_3(x)     (x == TM_CH_3)
00549 #if (LIBCFG_PWM_8_CHANNEL)
00550 #define IS_TM_CH_4(x)     (x == TM_CH_4)
00551 #define IS_TM_CH_5(x)     (x == TM_CH_5)
00552 #define IS_TM_CH_6(x)     (x == TM_CH_6)
00553 #define IS_TM_CH_7(x)     (x == TM_CH_7)
00554 #else
00555 #define IS_TM_CH_4(x)     (0)
00556 #define IS_TM_CH_5(x)     (0)
00557 #define IS_TM_CH_6(x)     (0)
00558 #define IS_TM_CH_7(x)     (0)
00559 #endif
00560 #define IS_TM_CH(x)  (IS_TM_CH_0(x) || IS_TM_CH_1(x) || \
00561                       IS_TM_CH_2(x) || IS_TM_CH_3(x) || \
00562                       IS_TM_CH_4(x) || IS_TM_CH_5(x) || \
00563                       IS_TM_CH_6(x) || IS_TM_CH_7(x) )
00564 
00565 /**
00566  * @brief Used to check parameter of the channel for PWM input function.
00567  */
00568 #define IS_TM_CH_PWMI(x) (((x) == TM_CH_0) || ((x) == TM_CH_1))
00569 /**
00570  * @brief Used to check parameter of the clock divider.
00571  */
00572 #define IS_TM_CKDIV_OFF(x) (x == TM_CKDIV_OFF)
00573 #define IS_TM_CKDIV_2(x)   (x == TM_CKDIV_2)
00574 #define IS_TM_CKDIV_4(x)   (x == TM_CKDIV_4)
00575 
00576 #if (LIBCFG_TM_CKDIV_8)
00577 #define IS_TM_CKDIV_8(x)   (x == TM_CKDIV_8)
00578 #else
00579 #define IS_TM_CKDIV_8(x)   (0)
00580 #endif
00581 
00582 #define IS_TM_CKDIV(x)  (IS_TM_CKDIV_OFF(x) || \
00583                          IS_TM_CKDIV_2(x)   || \
00584                          IS_TM_CKDIV_4(x)   || \
00585                          IS_TM_CKDIV_8(x))
00586 /**
00587  * @brief Used to check parameter of the counter mode.
00588  */
00589 #define IS_TM_CNT_MODE(x)   ((x == TM_CNT_MODE_UP) ||  \
00590                              (x == TM_CNT_MODE_CA1) || \
00591                              (x == TM_CNT_MODE_CA2) || \
00592                              (x == TM_CNT_MODE_CA3) || \
00593                              (x == TM_CNT_MODE_DOWN))
00594 /**
00595  * @brief Used to check parameter of the channel polarity.
00596  */
00597 #define IS_TM_CHP(x)    ((x == TM_CHP_NONINVERTED) || (x == TM_CHP_INVERTED))
00598 /**
00599  * @brief Used to check parameter of the channel control.
00600  */
00601 #define IS_TM_CHCTL(x)  ((x == TM_CHCTL_DISABLE) || (x == TM_CHCTL_ENABLE))
00602 /**
00603  * @brief Used to check parameter of the channel capture / compare PDMA selection.
00604  */
00605 #define IS_TM_CHCCDS(x) ((x == TM_CHCCDS_CHCCEV) || (x == TM_CHCCDS_UEV))
00606 /**
00607  * @brief Used to check parameter of the channel input selection.
00608  */
00609 #define IS_TM_CHCCS(x)  ((x == TM_CHCCS_DIRECT) || \
00610                            (x == TM_CHCCS_INDIRECT) || \
00611                            (x == TM_CHCCS_TRCED))
00612 /**
00613  * @brief Used to check parameter of the channel capture prescaler.
00614  */
00615 #define IS_TM_CHPSC(x)  ((x == TM_CHPSC_OFF) || \
00616                            (x == TM_CHPSC_2) || \
00617                            (x == TM_CHPSC_4) || \
00618                            (x == TM_CHPSC_8))
00619 #if 0
00620 /**
00621  * @brief Used to check parameter of the ETI prescaler.
00622  */
00623 #define IS_TM_ETIPSC(x) ((x == TM_ETIPSC_OFF) || \
00624                            (x == TM_ETIPSC_2) || \
00625                            (x == TM_ETIPSC_4) || \
00626                            (x == TM_ETIPSC_8))
00627 #endif
00628 /**
00629  * @brief Used to check parameter of the TM interrupt.
00630  */
00631 #define IS_TM_INT(x) (((x & 0xFF0F10F0) == 0x0) && (x != 0))
00632 /**
00633  * @brief Used to check parameter of the TM PDMA request.
00634  */
00635 #define IS_TM_PDMA(x) (((x & 0xFAF0FFFF) == 0x0) && (x != 0))
00636 /**
00637  * @brief Used to check parameter of the TM interrupt for \ref TM_GetIntStatus function.
00638  */
00639 #define IS_TM_INT_CH0CC(x) (x == TM_INT_CH0CC)
00640 #define IS_TM_INT_CH1CC(x) (x == TM_INT_CH1CC)
00641 #define IS_TM_INT_CH2CC(x) (x == TM_INT_CH2CC)
00642 #define IS_TM_INT_CH3CC(x) (x == TM_INT_CH3CC)
00643 #if (LIBCFG_PWM_8_CHANNEL)
00644 #define IS_TM_INT_CH4CC(x) (x == TM_INT_CH4CC)
00645 #define IS_TM_INT_CH5CC(x) (x == TM_INT_CH5CC)
00646 #define IS_TM_INT_CH6CC(x) (x == TM_INT_CH6CC)
00647 #define IS_TM_INT_CH7CC(x) (x == TM_INT_CH7CC)
00648 #else
00649 #define IS_TM_INT_CH4CC(x) (0)
00650 #define IS_TM_INT_CH5CC(x) (0)
00651 #define IS_TM_INT_CH6CC(x) (0)
00652 #define IS_TM_INT_CH7CC(x) (0)
00653 #endif
00654 #define IS_TM_INT_UEV(x)   (x == TM_INT_UEV)
00655 #define IS_TM_INT_UEV2(x)  (x == TM_INT_UEV2)
00656 #define IS_TM_INT_TEV(x)   (x == TM_INT_TEV)
00657 #define IS_TM_INT_BRKEV(x) (x == TM_INT_BRKEV)
00658 #define IS_TM_GET_INT(x)   (IS_TM_INT_CH0CC(x) || \
00659                             IS_TM_INT_CH1CC(x) || \
00660                             IS_TM_INT_CH2CC(x) || \
00661                             IS_TM_INT_CH3CC(x) || \
00662                             IS_TM_INT_CH4CC(x) || \
00663                             IS_TM_INT_CH5CC(x) || \
00664                             IS_TM_INT_CH6CC(x) || \
00665                             IS_TM_INT_CH7CC(x) || \
00666                             IS_TM_INT_UEV(x)   || \
00667                             IS_TM_INT_UEV2(x)  || \
00668                             IS_TM_INT_TEV(x)   || \
00669                             IS_TM_INT_BRKEV(x))
00670 
00671 /**
00672  * @brief Used to check parameter of the TM STI selection.
00673  */
00674 #define IS_TM_TRSEL(x)     ((x == TM_TRSEL_UEVG)   || \
00675                             (x == TM_TRSEL_TI0S0)  || \
00676                             (x == TM_TRSEL_TI1S1)  || \
00677                             (x == TM_TRSEL_ETIF)   || \
00678                             (x == TM_TRSEL_TI0BED) || \
00679                             IS_TRSEL_ITI0(x)       || \
00680                             IS_TRSEL_ITI1(x)       || \
00681                             IS_TRSEL_ITI2(x))
00682 /**
00683  * @brief Used to check parameter of the ITI.
00684  */
00685 #if (LIBCFG_TM_NO_ITI == 1)
00686 #else
00687 #define IS_TM_ITI(x)  ((x == TM_TRSEL_ITI0) || (x == TM_TRSEL_ITI1) || (x == TM_TRSEL_ITI2))
00688 #endif
00689 /**
00690  * @brief Used to check parameter of the TM_TRSEL for \ref TM_ChExternalClockConfig function.
00691  */
00692 #define IS_TM_TRSEL_CH(x)  ((x == TM_TRSEL_TI0S0) || (x == TM_TRSEL_TI1S1) || \
00693                               (x == TM_TRSEL_TI0BED))
00694 /**
00695  * @brief Used to check parameter of the TM ETI polarity.
00696  */
00697 #define IS_TM_ETIPOL(x) ((x == TM_ETIPOL_NONINVERTED) || (x == TM_ETIPOL_INVERTED))
00698 /**
00699  * @brief Used to check parameter of the TM prescaler reload time.
00700  */
00701 #define IS_TM_PSC_RLD(x) ((x == TM_PSC_RLD_UPDATE) || (x == TM_PSC_RLD_IMMEDIATE))
00702 /**
00703  * @brief Used to check parameter of the forced action.
00704  */
00705 #define IS_TM_OM_FORCED(x) ((x == TM_OM_FORCED_ACTIVE) || (x == TM_OM_FORCED_INACTIVE))
00706 /**
00707  * @brief Used to check parameter of the decoder mode.
00708  */
00709 #define IS_TM_SMSEL_DECODER(x)  ((x == TM_SMSEL_DECODER1) || (x == TM_SMSEL_DECODER2) || \
00710                                    (x == TM_SMSEL_DECODER3))
00711 /**
00712  * @brief Used to check parameter of the event.
00713  */
00714 #define IS_TM_EVENT(x)  (((x & 0xFFFFFAF0) == 0x0000) && (x != 0x0000))
00715 /**
00716  * @brief Used to check parameter of the TM master mode selection.
00717  */
00718 #define IS_TM_MMSEL_RESET(x)   (x == TM_MMSEL_RESET)
00719 #define IS_TM_MMSEL_ENABLE(x)  (x == TM_MMSEL_ENABLE)
00720 #define IS_TM_MMSEL_UPDATE(x)  (x == TM_MMSEL_UPDATE)
00721 #define IS_TM_MMSEL_CH0CC(x)   (x == TM_MMSEL_CH0CC)
00722 #define IS_TM_MMSEL_CH0OREF(x) (x == TM_MMSEL_CH0OREF)
00723 #define IS_TM_MMSEL_CH1OREF(x) (x == TM_MMSEL_CH1OREF)
00724 #define IS_TM_MMSEL_CH2OREF(x) (x == TM_MMSEL_CH2OREF)
00725 #define IS_TM_MMSEL_CH3OREF(x) (x == TM_MMSEL_CH3OREF)
00726 #if (LIBCFG_PWM_8_CHANNEL)
00727 #define IS_TM_MMSEL_CH4OREF(x) (x == TM_MMSEL_CH4OREF)
00728 #define IS_TM_MMSEL_CH5OREF(x) (x == TM_MMSEL_CH5OREF)
00729 #define IS_TM_MMSEL_CH6OREF(x) (x == TM_MMSEL_CH6OREF)
00730 #define IS_TM_MMSEL_CH7OREF(x) (x == TM_MMSEL_CH7OREF)
00731 #else
00732 #define IS_TM_MMSEL_CH4OREF(x) (0)
00733 #define IS_TM_MMSEL_CH5OREF(x) (0)
00734 #define IS_TM_MMSEL_CH6OREF(x) (0)
00735 #define IS_TM_MMSEL_CH7OREF(x) (0)
00736 #endif
00737 #define IS_TM_MMSEL(x)  (IS_TM_MMSEL_RESET(x)   || \
00738                          IS_TM_MMSEL_ENABLE(x)  || \
00739                          IS_TM_MMSEL_UPDATE(x)  || \
00740                          IS_TM_MMSEL_CH0CC(x)   || \
00741                          IS_TM_MMSEL_CH0OREF(x) || \
00742                          IS_TM_MMSEL_CH1OREF(x) || \
00743                          IS_TM_MMSEL_CH2OREF(x) || \
00744                          IS_TM_MMSEL_CH3OREF(x) || \
00745                          IS_TM_MMSEL_CH4OREF(x) || \
00746                          IS_TM_MMSEL_CH5OREF(x) || \
00747                          IS_TM_MMSEL_CH6OREF(x) || \
00748                          IS_TM_MMSEL_CH7OREF(x))
00749 
00750 /**
00751  * @brief Used to check parameter of the TM slave mode.
00752  */
00753 #define IS_TM_SLAVE_MODE(x) ((x == TM_SMSEL_RESTART) || (x == TM_SMSEL_PAUSE) || \
00754                                (x == TM_SMSEL_TRIGGER) || (x == TM_SMSEL_STIED))
00755 /**
00756  * @brief Used to check parameter of the TM flag.
00757  */
00758 #define IS_TM_FLAG_CH0CC(x) (x == TM_FLAG_CH0CC)
00759 #define IS_TM_FLAG_CH1CC(x) (x == TM_FLAG_CH1CC)
00760 #define IS_TM_FLAG_CH2CC(x) (x == TM_FLAG_CH2CC)
00761 #define IS_TM_FLAG_CH3CC(x) (x == TM_FLAG_CH3CC)
00762 #if (LIBCFG_PWM_8_CHANNEL)
00763 #define IS_TM_FLAG_CH4CC(x) (x == TM_FLAG_CH4CC)
00764 #define IS_TM_FLAG_CH5CC(x) (x == TM_FLAG_CH5CC)
00765 #define IS_TM_FLAG_CH6CC(x) (x == TM_FLAG_CH6CC)
00766 #define IS_TM_FLAG_CH7CC(x) (x == TM_FLAG_CH7CC)
00767 #else
00768 #define IS_TM_FLAG_CH4CC(x) (0)
00769 #define IS_TM_FLAG_CH5CC(x) (0)
00770 #define IS_TM_FLAG_CH6CC(x) (0)
00771 #define IS_TM_FLAG_CH7CC(x) (0)
00772 #endif
00773 #define IS_TM_FLAG_CH0OC(x) (x == TM_FLAG_CH0OC)
00774 #define IS_TM_FLAG_CH1OC(x) (x == TM_FLAG_CH1OC)
00775 #define IS_TM_FLAG_CH2OC(x) (x == TM_FLAG_CH2OC)
00776 #define IS_TM_FLAG_CH3OC(x) (x == TM_FLAG_CH3OC)
00777 #define IS_TM_FLAG_UEV(x)   (x == TM_FLAG_UEV)
00778 #define IS_TM_FLAG_UEV2(x)  (x == TM_FLAG_UEV2)
00779 #define IS_TM_FLAG_TEV(x)   (x == TM_FLAG_TEV)
00780 #define IS_TM_FLAG_BRK0(x)  (x == TM_FLAG_BRK0)
00781 #define IS_TM_FLAG_BRK1(x)  (x == TM_FLAG_BRK1)
00782 #define IS_TM_FLAG(x) (IS_TM_FLAG_CH0CC(x) || \
00783                        IS_TM_FLAG_CH1CC(x) || \
00784                        IS_TM_FLAG_CH2CC(x) || \
00785                        IS_TM_FLAG_CH3CC(x) || \
00786                        IS_TM_FLAG_CH4CC(x) || \
00787                        IS_TM_FLAG_CH5CC(x) || \
00788                        IS_TM_FLAG_CH6CC(x) || \
00789                        IS_TM_FLAG_CH7CC(x) || \
00790                        IS_TM_FLAG_CH0OC(x) || \
00791                        IS_TM_FLAG_CH1OC(x) || \
00792                        IS_TM_FLAG_CH2OC(x) || \
00793                        IS_TM_FLAG_CH3OC(x) || \
00794                        IS_TM_FLAG_UEV(x)   || \
00795                        IS_TM_FLAG_UEV2(x)  || \
00796                        IS_TM_FLAG_TEV(x)   || \
00797                        IS_TM_FLAG_BRK0(x)  || \
00798                        IS_TM_FLAG_BRK1(x))
00799 
00800 /**
00801  * @brief Used to check parameter of the TM flag for \ref TM_ClearFlag function.
00802  */
00803 #define IS_TM_FLAG_CLR(x) (((x & 0xFFFFFA00) == 0) && (x != 0))
00804 /**
00805  * @brief Used to check value of TM digital filter.
00806  */
00807 #if (LIBCFG_TM_652XX_V1)
00808 #define IS_TM_FILTER(x) (x <= 0xFF)
00809 #else
00810 #define IS_TM_FILTER(x) (x <= 0xF)
00811 #endif
00812 
00813 /**
00814   * @}
00815   */
00816

00818   * @}
00819   */

00831 #define TM_SetCaptureCompare5(TMx, Cmp)       TM_SetCaptureCompare(TMx, TM_CH_5, Cmp)
00832 #define TM_SetCaptureCompare6(TMx, Cmp)       TM_SetCaptureCompare(TMx, TM_CH_6, Cmp)
00833 #define TM_SetCaptureCompare7(TMx, Cmp)       TM_SetCaptureCompare(TMx, TM_CH_7, Cmp)
00834 #endif

00838 #define TM_ForcedOREF2(TMx, ForcedAction)     TM_ForcedOREF(TMx, TM_CH_2, ForcedAction)

00843 #define TM_ForcedOREF6(TMx, ForcedAction)     TM_ForcedOREF(TMx, TM_CH_6, ForcedAction)
00844 #define TM_ForcedOREF7(TMx, ForcedAction)     TM_ForcedOREF(TMx, TM_CH_7, ForcedAction)
00845 #endif

00853 #define TM_GetCaptureCompare1(TMx)            TM_GetCaptureCompare(TMx, TM_CH_1)
00854 #define TM_GetCaptureCompare2(TMx)            TM_GetCaptureCompare(TMx, TM_CH_2)
00855 #define TM_GetCaptureCompare3(TMx)            TM_GetCaptureCompare(TMx, TM_CH_3)
00856 #if (LIBCFG_PWM_8_CHANNEL)
